CO2 meter
HUB Map Sign in
CO2 meter Application
//Navigation New Routes Profil My routes Test yourself Sign in
Account Sign in or register
//1st page
This application allows you to account for your CO2 emissions when travelling. Travelling is the main source of CO2 emissions, a French person emits on average 2.5 tons of CO2 per year for his travels for a total of 12 tons, As a reminder, in theory one should not exceed 1.2 to 2 tons of CO2 per year and per inhabitant to be carbon neutral. With this application you will be able to set monthly or annual targets to reduce your emissions. There are 3 modes for posting: Tracking: choose the logo corresponding to the mode of travel and launch the GPS tracking. Favourite journeys: you can save your home to work or other regular journeys and just add this journey to the meter without activating tracking. Route: The application allows you to search for a route with a starting and destination point. Use: Means of transport marked with a plus allows you to define the number of passengers in the vehicle and thus reduce your emissions. The number marked below is an indication, the larger the number, the more polluting the vehicle is. Continue
